item.title: Using Ocapic on OSX with ReasonML
item.description: This is just some random documentation for myself in the future or the two other people on the planet who want to mess around with Ocapic on OSX while using Reason instead of Ocaml. First you need to install all the things, then you need to write your souce code. If all you need is the magic incantion at the end with no explanations: $ ocapic \ [ <pic> ] \ [ OCAMLC_OPTS ] \ [ OPTIONS ] \ -pp "refmt -parse re -print ml" <source.
